dashboard.title: Main Dashboard
dashboard.description: An overview of your key business metrics.

dashboard.pdfError: Sorry, there was an error creating the PDF.
dashboard.emptyMessage: Click here to add your first insight!
dashboard.newDashboardPrompt: Enter the name for the new dashboard:
dashboard.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the "{name}" dashboard? All associated cards and variables will be lost.
dashboard.noDashboardsMessage: Click the search button to create your first dashboard.
dashboard.saveAsPrompt: Enter the new name for the dashboard copy:
dashboard.selectToImport: Select the dashboards from the file to import:
dashboard.importFilePrompt: Select an export file (.json) to import.
dashboard.importInvalidFile: The selected file is not a valid export file.

variables.name: Variable Name
variables.none: No variables defined for this dashboard.
variables.optionsDesc: If options are provided, this variable will become a dropdown selector. The 'Value' field above will hold the currently selected option's value.
variables.label: Label

dashboard.syncingData: We're fetching your latest settings and data. This may take a moment.

chartCard.spacerDescription: An empty card for layout organization.
chartCard.selectCategory: Please select a Category (X-Axis) to display this chart.
chartCard.selectValue: Please select a Value (Y-Axis / Metric) to display this chart.
chartCard.selectValues: Please select at least one Value (Y-Axis / Metric) to display this chart.

queryEditor.title: Query Editor
queryEditor.vizDescriptionPlaceholder: Add a short description for this card
queryEditor.noDataSourceError: Please select a data source before running a query.
queryEditor.runQueryToEditColumns: Run the query to see and change available columns.
queryEditor.noActiveDashboardError: No active dashboard selected. Please create or select a dashboard first.
queryEditor.aiPromptLabel: Describe the data or insight you want to see:
queryEditor.aiPromptPlaceholder: e.g., total sales per month, or top 5 most expensive products
queryEditor.aiError: An error occurred while generating the query. Please check your connection or try again.

postProcessing.title: Post-Processing (JavaScript)
postProcessing.description: Write JS code to transform results. Raw data is available as the data variable (an array of objects). Dashboard variables are also available by name (e.g., sales_target). Your script must return a new array of objects.

settings.title: Settings
settings.permissionsDesc: Manage user roles and data access.
settings.removeSourceConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove the "{source}" data source?
settings.noDataSourcesToExport: No data sources available to export.
settings.addFormError: Please fill out all fields to add a data source.
settings.addFormErrorSupabase: Please provide both a Supabase URL and Supabase Anon Key.
settings.useProxyDesc: Connect via your backend server. Uncheck to connect directly from the browser (requires CORS configuration on Supabase).
settings.personalizeDesc: Customize the look and feel of your dashboards.
settings.usageAnalyticsDesc: See how your team is using the dashboards.
settings.autoSaveDesc: Automatically save changes to local storage.

modal.saveError: There was an error while trying to save your changes.
modal.saveSuccess: Your changes have been saved successfully.

app.authErrorDesc: Could not sign in. Please check your Firebase configuration and try again.
app.accessDeniedDesc: Access to this application is denied because the required authentication credentials (Firebase configuration) are missing. Please contact the administrator.
app.emailAccessDeniedDesc: Your email address is not authorized to access this application. Please contact an administrator.

envVars.title: Information
envVars.description: This page displays the environment variables and component properties that configure the application's connection and data context.
envVars.name: Variable Name
envVars.queryProxyUrlDesc: The URL for the backend proxy that handles database queries. All SQL, Redis, and MongoDB queries are sent to this endpoint.
envVars.configApiUrlDesc: The URL for the backend service that stores and retrieves configurations (e.g., data sources, dashboards). If not set, the app falls back to using browser localStorage.
envVars.tenantIdDesc: A unique identifier for the tenant, used in multi-tenant deployments. This is sent as an 'X-Tenant-Id' header in API requests to isolate data.
envVars.apiKeyDesc: The API key sent in the 'api_key' header for authenticating requests to backend services.
envVars.apiSecretDesc: The API secret sent in the 'api_secret' header for authenticating requests to backend services.
envVars.departmentDesc: The department associated with this dashboard instance. Passed as a component property, available as a `{{department}}` variable in queries, and sent as an `X-Department` header in configuration API requests.
envVars.ownerDesc: The owner associated with this dashboard instance. Passed as a component property, available as a `{{owner}}` variable in queries, and sent as an `X-Owner` header in configuration API requests.
envVars.propUsage: Can be used as a variable in queries:
envVars.supabaseUrlDesc: The URL for your Supabase project, used for storing configurations if the custom CONFIG_API_URL is not set.
envVars.supabaseKeyDesc: The 'anon' public key for your Supabase project, used for storing configurations.
envVars.supabaseSchemaDesc: If using Supabase for configuration storage, create the following table in your public schema. Be sure to configure Row Level Security (RLS) policies to match your application's security requirements.
